Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell is a promising technology to convert renewable energy sources to electricity electrochemically at high efficiencies, thus an important applied research topic worldwide.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: The in-house developed so-called F-stack-design aims at stationary applications and can achieve a very long lifetime.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: However, since production costs should be reduced, one research focus lies on finding suitable less expensive materials.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: Therefore, alternatives for the benchmark Ni-mesh as anode contacting element in the stack were studied.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: Several types of Ni-coated-steels were tested in a stack.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: After 3000 h of operation the different anode contact materials are compared with the Ni-mesh in terms of microstructure as well as chemical composition.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack

Sentencas: A discussion of the results is given.
Titulo: Investigation of Ni-coated-steel-meshes as alternative anode contact material to nickel in an SOFC stack
